de.systemagmbh.common.util
Class CSysProgArgParser

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary
      java.util.Hashtable
          java.util.Properties
              de.systemagmbh.common.util.CSysProgArgParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Map, Serializable
public class CSysProgArgParser
extends Properties

class CSysProgArgParser. Parses the program arguments and holds them in memory. By default the keys are not case sensitive. Usage: 


	void main(String[] args)
	{
		CSysProgArgParser pap=new CSysProgArgParser(args);

		String default="d:\\temp";
		String fileName=pap.get("f", default);

		if(!pap.check("h"))
			System.out.println("no help available");

		String state={ "ON", "AN" }
		if(!pap.check("s", state))
			System.out.println("state off");
	}

Version:
$Revision: 1.5 $, $JustDate: 30.08.00 $
Author:
RH
